eu.senseable.sparklib

Class Spark

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.senseable.sparklib.Spark

  • public class Spark
extends java.lang.Object
    Main interface for interacting with the Spark Cloud and Bluetooth components. Created by phil on 4/27/17.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Spark.Callbacks
      The main interace to the Spark Service for Android.
      class  Spark.Event 
      static interface  Spark.Status
      Bitfield values for transporting the status of the Spark Service to clients.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Spark(android.content.Context c, Spark.Callbacks cb)
      register a context and callback receiver to get updates whenever a Spark is in the area or has updated events.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Spark

        public Spark(android.content.Context c,
             Spark.Callbacks cb)
        register a context and callback receiver to get updates whenever a Spark is in the area or has updated events. The main interface is the data handed over via the callbacks in ab.
        Parameters:
        c - Context to operate on
        cb - Callbacks to be called on new data

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close(android.content.Context c)

      • getAddr

        public java.lang.String getAddr()
                         throws android.os.RemoteException
        returns the address of the currently bound Spark lighter, null if no lighter is bound.
        Returns:
        bluetooth address as string, null if not bound
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • setAddr

        public Spark setAddr(java.lang.String addr)
              throws android.os.RemoteException
        allows to modify the currently bound Spark lighter, identified with a bluetooth address.
        Parameters:
        addr - address to bind to, can be null to unbind
        Returns:
        the original object to chain calls.
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • getJSONEvents

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getJSONEvents()
                                               throws android.os.RemoteException
        returns the list of current events stored on this device. The string in those events encodes a JSONObject with a beg, end, and sid field. The beg and end are UTC timestamp of the beginning and end of a cigarette smoking event. For a list of java objects @see getEvents().
        Returns:
        list of events
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • setJSONEvents

        public void setJSONEvents(java.util.List<java.lang.String> events)
                   throws android.os.RemoteException
        modifies the list of stored events on the device, use carefully! The String in the supplied list must be a JSONObject with a beg and end field, which are UTC encoded timestamps.
        Parameters:
        events - JSONObjects with UTC-encoded timestamp field in beg and end
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • getEvents

        public java.util.List<Spark.Event> getEvents()
                                      throws android.os.RemoteException
        return a list of stored events on the device.
        Returns:
        list of Spark Events designating the smoking instances
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • setEvents

        public void setEvents(java.util.List<Spark.Event> events)
               throws android.os.RemoteException
        set the currently list of events stored on the device.
        Parameters:
        events - list of Spark Events
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException
